Articles.Content:
Hi All, 

 

I'm currently having an problem with my install.

When I except new missions to place a satellite in an equatorial orbit, the target orbit line does not display.

This does not happen with Polar orbits or any other target orbit other than equatorial.

Where should I start to find the problem?

Ive had the same problem and read that this is because the eccentricity(?) of the orbit is not defined, that is that 'angle' that the orbit nust be at.

Ive completed the contract by simply matching the numbers, i.e. if the contact states AP=205 PE=100 I just put it in that orbit.

Do you think this is something that would be solved if I removed some of the agency folders from my installed mods?

I've started a completely unmodded game, and 1 by 1 have re-added mods once I've discovered they aren't causing the problem. As you'll understand it's a slow process.

CallmedaDave, you are right, thats exactly what was happening. I figure it out after adding each mod to the game one after another and running the game.

Its's caused by the DMagic Science Mod. - Is it best to report it over on the mod page?

16 minutes ago, Amhran said:

CallmedaDave, you are right, thats exactly what was happening. I figure it out after adding each mod to the game one after another and running the game.

Its's caused by the DMagic Science Mod. - Is it best to report it over on the mod page?

 

 

It's a stock bug. 

Look under the "Career" category.
